trans-unit.source: Provides an interface to allow a composite-control designer to recreate the child controls of its associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface para permitir que um designer de controle de composição recrie os controles filho do seu controle associado em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: A class derived from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface to allow its associated designer to call the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl> implementa o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface para permitir que o designer associado chamar o controle <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> método em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The associated designer must derive from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.
trans-unit.target: O designer associado deve derivar de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor> interface é usada principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.

trans-unit.source: In a control derived from <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" />, recreates the child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: Em um controle derivado de <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl" />, recria os controles filho em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Called by the control's associated designer.
trans-unit.target: Chamado pelo designer associado do controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method allows a designer for a composite control to recreate the control's child controls at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> método permite que um designer para um controle composto recriar os controles filho do controle em tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ICompositeControlDesignerAccessor.RecreateChildControls%2A> método é usado principalmente por desenvolvedores de controle.
